changeSet.author: clarysabel

and.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ims_lot WHERE stock_id IS NULL;

changeSet.comment: Add not null restriction to ims_table.stock_id
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE ims_lot MODIFY stock_id VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: clarysabel

and.sqlCheck: select count(*) from (select stock_id, count(*) from ims_lot group by stock_id having count(*)>1) count_by_stock_id

changeSet.comment: Add stock_id unique index to ims_lot
